channel.title: Shops Not Working
channel.description:
I am typing in all the right stuff I think, it just isn't putting the Shop-Keeper anywhere. Here is what I have AT THE BOTTOM of autospawn.cfg: [code] spawn = 2862 3344 3252 0 3344 3252 3344 3252 2 Death[/code]
Here is what I have in Client.java: [code]} else if (NPCID == 2862) { //death PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; // PKing Shop }[/code]Please not that in my client.java that is UNDER another shops code, hence the else if. Here is what is in my Shops.cfg: [code]shop = 42 Deaths_Pking_Shop 2 2 4151 100 4675 100 6106 1000 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 3840 1000 3842 1000 3844 1000 3040 1000 2444 1000 2434 1000 2436 1000 2440 1000 2442 1000 7462 150 6570 100 6735 500[/code]Please help

item.title: Shops Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“CrushMe, post:4, topic:72998”]OK… 2 secs again, tell me what you want in your shop and ill make it for you, also what do you get when you compile your server? Also, where do you want your shop?[/quote]I get that it compiles… I mean, whenver I compile with new commands it works. I want just a PK shop… And, I would like it to be in the Normal Fighting Arena at the Duel Arena. Thanks.

Read full topic

@system wrote:

OK… 2 secs again, tell me what you want in your shop and ill make it for you, also what do you get when you compile your server? Also, where do you want your shop?

item.title: Shops Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I[quote=“CrushMe, post:2, topic:72998”]Umm… 2 secs

This code would make a perfectly working shop im going to post then compare to yours

spawn = 1552	3260	3436	0	2372	5062	2422	5117	1	Santa Shop

else if (NPCID == 1552) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; }

shop = 31 @whi@Santa's_xmas_grotto@whi@ 2 2 7336 1 7462 1 3105 1 1050 1 1037 1 1057 1 1055 1 1053 1 1961 1 1959 1 1187 1 3140 1 4087 1 4585 1 1149 1 6858 1 6860 1 6862 1 6856 1 6859 1 6861 1 6863 1 6857 1 4084 100
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 09:05:04 AM[/size][hr]Ah ha, i think my friend you see where your postioning death, should look like this

spawn = 2862 	3344	3252 	0	3344	3252	3344 	3252 	1	Death

Run it with the new death i put in autospawn and it should work - Add it, compile server then run :)… then tell me the outcome :)[/quote]it is still not working

Read full topic

item.description:

I am typing in all the right stuff I think, it just isn’t putting the Shop-Keeper anywhere. Here is what I have AT THE BOTTOM of autospawn.cfg:

spawn = 2862 3344 3252 0 3344 3252 3344 3252 2 Death

Here is what I have in Client.java:

} else if (NPCID == 2862) { //death PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; // PKing Shop }Please not that in my client.java that is UNDER another shops code, hence the else if. Here is what is in my Shops.cfg:

shop = 42 Deaths_Pking_Shop 2 2 4151 100 4675 100 6106 1000 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 3840 1000 3842 1000 3844 1000 3040 1000 2444 1000 2434 1000 2436 1000 2440 1000 2442 1000 7462 150 6570 100 6735 500Please help
